org.agilewiki.utils.ref

Class ConcurrentWeakValueMap<K extends java.lang.Comparable,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.utils.ref.ConcurrentWeakValueMap<K,T>

  • public class ConcurrentWeakValueMap<K extends java.lang.Comparable,T>
extends java.lang.Object

    A concurrent map with weak reference values, built on ConcurrentSkipList and KeyedWeakReference.

    ConcurrentWeakValueMap is intended for use in a thread-safe cache.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentSkipListMap<K,KeyedWeakReference<K,T>> map
      The wrapped concurrent skip list map.

        public void poll()
